org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

接口 RegionServerServices

  • 所有超级接口:
    Abortable, FavoredNodesForRegion, MutableOnlineRegions, OnlineRegions, Server, Stoppable
    所有已知实现类:
    HMaster, HMasterCommandLine.LocalHMaster, HRegionServer

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface RegionServerServices
extends Server, MutableOnlineRegions, FavoredNodesForRegion
    A curated subset of services provided by HRegionServer. For use internally only. Passed to Managers, Services and Chores so can pass less-than-a full-on HRegionServer at test-time. Be judicious adding API. Changes cause ripples through the code base.

      • getWAL

        WAL getWAL(RegionInfo regionInfo)
    throws IOException
        返回:
        the WAL for a particular region. Pass null for getting the default (common) WAL
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getWALs

        List<WAL> getWALs()
           throws IOException
        返回:

        IOException

      • registerService

        boolean registerService(com.google.protobuf.Service service)
        Registers a new protocol buffer Service subclass as a coprocessor endpoint to be available for handling
        参数:
        service - the Service subclass instance to expose as a coprocessor endpoint
        返回:
        true if the registration was successful, false

      • getHeapMemoryManager

        HeapMemoryManager getHeapMemoryManager()
        返回:
        heap memory manager instance

      • getCompactionPressure

        double getCompactionPressure()
        返回:
        the max compaction pressure of all stores on this regionserver. The value should be greater than or equal to 0.0, and any value greater than 1.0 means we enter the emergency state that some stores have too many store files.
        另请参阅:
        Store.getCompactionPressure()

      • getFlushThroughputController

        ThroughputController getFlushThroughputController()
        返回:
        the controller to avoid flush too fast

      • getFlushPressure

        @Deprecated
double getFlushPressure()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        the flush pressure of all stores on this regionserver. The value should be greater than or equal to 0.0, and any value greater than 1.0 means we enter the emergency state that global memstore size already exceeds lower limit.

      • getMetrics

        MetricsRegionServer getMetrics()
        返回:
        the metrics tracker for the region server

      • regionLock

        EntityLock regionLock(List<RegionInfo> regionInfos,
                      String description,
                      Abortable abort)
               throws IOException
        Master based locks on namespaces/tables/regions.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • unassign

        void unassign(byte[] regionName)
       throws IOException
        Unassign the given region from the current regionserver and assign it randomly. Could still be assigned to us. This is used to solve some tough problems for which you need to reset the state of a region. For example, if you hit FileNotFound exception and want to refresh the store file list.

        See HBASE-17712 for more details.

        抛出:
        IOException

      • isClusterUp

        boolean isClusterUp()
        返回:
        True if cluster is up; false if cluster is not up (we are shutting down).
